Name: CPU Invaders
About the game: Invaders are living inside your computer. You shouldn't let that happen! Interact with your desktop while playing, watch Youtube videos, chat with your friends and more! CPU Invaders overlaps the game itself with your computer screen. Score system, bosses and draggable interface; Enemies with unique set of skills to destroy your CPU; Original 8-bit soundtrack, produced by Frost Orb. (Windows feature aero must be enabled or the game background will be solid black)
